creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: black and brown eagle with white tail perched on dark rock with back toward viewer, craning head around to face viewer; darker clouds at UL with snowflakes beginning to fall; brambles with white leaves in lower portion
markings: square intaglio seal ULQ: 栖鳳
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
title: White-tailed Eagle in a Snowstorm
